column2: User Stories
column4: Acceptance Criteria

column2: As a User, I want to sign up for an account using my email address or social media profiles so that I can access exclusive features.
column4:
User can sign up with valid email or social media account.
Validation errors are shown for incorrect inputs.
User is redirected after successful signup.

column2: As a User, I want to be redirected to the login page immediately after signing up so that I can log in to my new account and start using its features.
column4:
After signup, user lands on the login page.
A success message is displayed.

column2: As a User, I want to log in to my account using my credentials so that I can access my saved products and order history.
column4:
Login form accepts valid credentials.
Displays error on invalid credentials.
Redirects to dashboard after login.

column2: As a Registered Customer, I want to update my account information so that I can keep my details up-to-date.
column4:
User can view and edit personal details.
Changes are saved to the database.

column2: As a Guest User, I want to access 3D product visualizations without requiring a login so that I can easily browse products.
column4: 3D product viewer accessible without authentication.

column2: As a Guest User, I want to be prompted to sign up when I try to save a product so that I can save my favourite products or buy them if I don�t have an account.
column4: Attempting to save prompts login/signup modal.

column2: As a Customer, I want to view products in 3D within my web browser so that I can get a better sense of their size, shape, and details.
column4:
The product model can be rotated smoothly in all directions (horizontal and vertical).
Rotation is responsive to mouse or touch input.
No significant lag or performance issues during rotation.

column2: As a Customer, I want to rotate products in 3D so that I can view them from different angles.
column4:
User can rotate model on all axes.
Rotation responds to mouse/touch.
No noticeable lag.

column2: As a Customer, I want to zoom in on product details so that I can see specific features more clearly.
column4:
Scroll/pinch zoom works.
Zoom maintains model clarity.

column2: As a Customer, I want to search a product so that I can easily find it.
column4:
Search bar returns relevant results.
Shows "No results found" if no match.

column2: As a Registered Customer, I want to save my favourite products so that I can easily access them later.
column4:
Clicking 'save' adds product to user�s favourites.
Success message shown.

column2: As a Registered Customer, I want to leave reviews and ratings for products based on their 3D visualizations so that I can help others make informed decisions.
column4:
Review and rating forms are available after purchase.
Submission updates review section.

column2: As a Registered Customer, I want to view my order history and saved products so that I can track my purchases and preferences.
column4: Order history and saved items are visible on user profile.

column2: As a Customer, I want to browse products by category and sub-category using the navigation menu so that I can find items easily.
column4:
Products grouped by category/sub-category.
Filter changes results dynamically.

column2: As a Customer, I want to filter products by category type so that I can find my desired product easily.
column4: Category filter updates product display accordingly.

column2: As a Customer, I want to filter products by price range so that I can find products within my budget.
column4:
Price slider or input filter provided.
Results update on range selection.

column2: As a Customer, I want to use a filters button to apply multiple filters at once so that I can select all my requirements together.
column4:
Filters can be applied in combination.
Button updates result list accordingly.

column2: As a Customer, I want to be redirected to the page with filtered products even if no filters are applied so that I can see all options in one place.
column4: Clicking 'filter' navigates to filtered results page.

column2: As a Customer, I want to remove products from my saved list so that I can manage my preferences.
column4: 'Remove' button deletes item from saved list.

column2: As a Customer, I want to view feedback from other customers so that I can get better insight into the product.
column4: Reviews displayed on product page.

column2: As a Customer, I want to rate a purchased product so that my feedback helps others.
column4: Rating stars available post-purchase.

column2: As an Admin, I want to add new products so that customers can view the latest items.
column4: Admin panel allows product creation with details and 3D model upload.

column2: As an Admin, I want to update product information such as quantity so that customers see accurate data.
column4: Editable fields for inventory in admin panel.

column2: As an Admin, I want to delete unavailable products so that they don't appear to customers.
column4: Delete option removes product from listings.

column2: As a Customer, I want access to help support so that I can report issues.
column4: Help/contact page with issue form.

column2: As an Admin, I want to provide contact details in the help desk so that customers can reach out directly.
column4: Help section includes email/phone.

column2: As a Customer, I want to view FAQs so that I can find quick answers.
column4: FAQs displayed in a collapsible format.

column2: As an Admin, I want to add a text box for custom questions so that all customer queries are addressed.
column4: Text area under FAQ with submit button.

column2: As a Customer, I want to submit customization requests so that the product suits my needs.
column4: Optional customization form during checkout.

column2: As a Customer, I want to recheck all details before purchase so that I can verify accuracy.
column4: Summary screen before final payment.

column2: As an Admin, I want to enable editing of customer details at checkout review so that they can fix errors.
column4: 'Edit' buttons on checkout review screen.

column2: As a Guest user, I want error alerts for wrong login inputs so that I can correct them.
column4: Inline error messages on invalid login attempts.

column2: As a Customer, I want a loading animation while products load so that I know the app is working.
column4: Spinner or loader shown during data fetch.

column2: As a Customer, I want a �No results found� message when no search results exist so that I am clearly informed.
column4: Message shown with no search matches.

column2: As a Registered Customer, I want a confirmation after saving a product to favourites so that I know it worked.
column4: Snackbar or modal confirmation shown.

column2: As a Customer, I want a responsive layout so that the app works well on all devices.
column4: Layout adjusts to mobile, tablet, desktop.

column2: As a Registered Customer, I want to logout from my account so that I can end my session securely.
column4: Logout button clears session and redirects to login page.

column2: As a Customer, I want to use a navigation bar to switch pages so that I can explore the site easily.
column4: Navigation bar present with links to Home, Products, Categories, etc.

column2: As a Registered Customer, I want a success message after submitting a review so that I know it was received.
column4: Success toast or modal shown post-submission.

column2: As a Customer, I want to see the total number of filtered products so that I understand the result count.
column4:
Count the results shown at top of filtered list.
Updates dynamically with filters applied.
